name: Lockdown Escape
description:
You are stuck in a city wide lockdown and sick of it. You need to find 3 travel documents so that you can get through the crowds and passed the police to escape this city.

Move around the city, gather what items you can from the dumpsters while you search for other peoples travel documents and use these items to find your way to the only available exit.

Dodge all npcs, getting detected by police will increase your wanted level and being close to civilians will increase the influence they have on you.
If you hit max wanted level or max influence, you lose.
